participant_1.background:
I hiked and swam at the lake on my last vacation.
I'm not sure how to fit in with people my age because I didn't have much social interaction when I was younger.
I'm trying to balance my school work with my social life and my workouts.
he taught me right from wrong.
I love music that makes me feel nostalgic, like the music of my father's era.

participant_2.background:
I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery.
I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore.
I am pretty close with my family.
I like to get Chick-fil-A on my way to work.
i speak fluent italian.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to sing. I wish I could sing in a choir, but my asthma won't let me.
I'm sorry to hear that. I love singing too. I like to sing in the shower.
That's good! I'm glad you can still sing. What's your favorite thing to do on vacation?
I love to go hiking and swimming. I went on a hike and swam at the lake last vacation. It was so much fun!
That sounds amazing! I love hiking too. I went hiking in the Grand Canyon a few years ago. It was so beautiful!
Wow! That sounds like an amazing experience. I've always wanted to go to the Grand Canyon.
You should go! It's so beautiful. What's your favorite type of music?
I love music that makes me feel nostalgic, like the music of my father's era.
That's cool! I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery.
That's a great idea! I love Disney movies too. I would love to have a Disney nursery.
I'm glad you like it! I'm pretty close with my family. I'm sure they would love it too.
I'm glad you're close with your family. I'm not as close with mine, but I'm trying to be.
That's good! I think it's important to be close with your family.
I agree. I'm glad you're close with yours.
Thanks! I'm glad we got to talk about our favorite things.
Me too! It was nice talking to you.
